div.p: The following libraries are common to some or all of the recommendation implementations:

td.a: Opioid Terminology Management Knowledge-base Data (OMTK) Library

tr.td: CQL Library that provides logic for implementation of opioid management functionality including Milligram Morphine Equivalents (MME).
For reference, the complete CQL source for the OMTK Logic Library.
CQL Library that provides logic for implementation of opioid management functionality including Milligram Morphine Equivalents (MME).
For reference, the complete CQL source for the OMTK Logic Library.
CQL Library that provides common logic for the recommendations
For reference, the complete CQL source for the common logic.
